message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. It's a great deal for something of such high quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $150. This product is truly worth it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $150 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
